name: Not Your Day
description:
"Not Your Day" is a visual novel in the cyberpunk setting with meaningful choices and different endings.

Duration: ~10 minutes.

Endings: ~8 

"You wake up in an incomprehensible basement, your head hurts and it turns out that you have been kidnapped. 

Who are your kidnappers? 

What do they want? 

And most importantly - can you get out alive?"

Scenario: Daniel Velitskiy and Luise Zelgert

Art: Luise Zelgert (inst: https://www.instagram.com/oktards/)

Programming: Daniel Velitskiy (inst: https://www.instagram.com/daniel_velitskiy/)

Music: Khorovvod (inst: https://www.instagram.com/khorovvod/)

Engine: RenPy
